  3. Margin proximity

Margin proximity

Table of contents

  • Description
  • Options

Related

Design guide

  • Absolute positioning - Design guide
  • Reflowing content around grids - Design guide

Description

Increase of decrease the proxmity of one object to another by using these classes. Additionally these classes allow grid and non-grid content to exist in the same row.

Options

Top margin Right margin Bottom margin Left margin
  • .mrgn-tp-0 = 0px
  • .mrgn-tp-sm = 5px
  • .mrgn-tp-md = 15px
  • .mrgn-tp-lg = 30px
  • .mrgn-tp-xl = 50px
  • .mrgn-rght-0 = 0px
  • .mrgn-rght-sm = 5px
  • .mrgn-rght-md = 15px
  • .mrgn-rght-lg = 30px
  • .mrgn-rght-xl = 50px
  • .mrgn-bttm-0 = 0px
  • .mrgn-bttm-sm = 5px
  • .mrgn-bttm-md = 15px
  • .mrgn-bttm-lg = 30px
  • .mrgn-bttm-xl = 50px
  • .mrgn-lft-0 = 0px
  • .mrgn-lft-sm = 5px
  • .mrgn-lft-md = 15px
  • .mrgn-lft-lg = 30px
  • .mrgn-lft-xl = 50px

(Info goes here)

Do not use when
